com.ooyala.android

Class ID3TagNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.ID3TagNotifier

  • public class ID3TagNotifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Connect objects which can read ID3 tags from asset streams, to objects that want to perform some action (e.g. update analytics) when an ID3 tag is seen.
